title: The Novo Castrian story: an impression of the Port of Newcastle, Australia
creator_credit: Peter Whitchurch and New South Wales. Maritime Services Board
brief_description: The port of Newcastle, N.S.W., its existing facilities and work on new wharf and reclamation developments. The life and major industries of the city and the Hunter Valley are shown briefly.
